message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have less, I'll take more, let's see what you think!
You're being greedy, but I'll meet you halfway
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy
I'm not desperate yet, but I'll give you a better deal
You're running out of time, take it or leave it
I'm not out of options yet, let's try again
You're getting close to nothing, don't expect mercy
You're being ruthless, but I'll try to make a last stand
You're running out of money, take it or lose everything
I'm not going down without a fight, let's try again
You're almost out of options, this is my final offer
I'm not giving up yet, let's see if I can squeeze something out of this
You're down to pennies, take it or leave it
I'm not going to give up, I'll try to squeeze out one more penny
